column4: Hi! Ubuntu wont use my soundcard for playback... although Ive chosen it in "System->Settings->Sound" and "test" gives me the beep-sound all playback goes to the chips on the motherboard!
can you not disable your oboard in the bios, as so ubuntu only knows of one sound card to use.
good idea! ill do that right away! thanks!
disabling on board sound chips in BOIS did the trick, thanks" :D
